title: Changing the in-game language
body:
Hi everyone,

I'm sorry if this has been spoken about before but I was hoping to get a more up to date answer. I was wondering what the rules are on changing the in-game voices, champions, announcer, etc to another language such as Korean or Japanese. I understand Riot's rules against using 3rd party programs but am I still able to get banned if I change the voice files manually?

If this is fully legal, does anyone have a reliable way to get those files?

Thanks so much for you help,

-Revan

replies.body:
Im pretty sure I read that changing sound files counts as modification to the game and files which counts as cheating as far as riot is concerned.
I think this was in a discussion about things like Eves little sound she makes when an enemy is in range. Its a quiet blip but some people replace the file with a louder BEEP to make it a lot more obvious.

Edit. 
But then they condone 3rd party skin programs like ultimate skin installer which replace game files. Or at least used to. Idk.
